src_text: I-LEKGOTLA YEKHABHINETHI
trg_text: Phase 2 Plan

src_text: UMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa ubize i-Lekgotla yeKhabhinethi ebanjwe ngoLwesine mhla zingama-27 kuMasingana 2022.
trg_text: President Cyril Ramaphosa convened the Cabinet Lekgotla on Thursday, 27 January 2022.

src_text: Beyihanjelwe ngabaholi abebemele zonke izinhlaka zikahulumen Laba baholi babandakanya oNgqongqoshe, amaPhini oNgqongqoshe, oNdunankulu, abaQondisi-Jikelele kanye nobuholi beNhlangano Yohulumeni Basekhaya yaseNingizimu Afrik
trg_text: It was attended by the leadership structures representing all spheres of governmen They included Ministers, Deputy Ministers, Premiers, Directors-General and leadership of the South African Local Government Associatio

src_text: UMongameli ubememe abaholi bakahulumeni njengengxenye yokudidiyela nokuhambelanisa imizamo kahulumeni yokusabela kwizinselele ezibhekene nezwe, ikakhulukazi ukuze kugxilwe ngokuphuthumayo ekuxazululeni izinselele ezintathu, ububha, ukuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi kanye nokungalingan Ubanxusile abaholi ukuba baqalise izinguquko ezinohlonze ukuvuselela ukukhula komnotho futhi kwakhiwe ngegiya eliphakeme amathuba omsebenzi adingeka kakhul
trg_text: The President invited the government leaders as part of integrating and aligning government s responses to challenges facing the country, particularly to focus urgently on addressing the triple challenges of poverty, unemployment and inequalit He called on the leaders to effect fundamental reforms to revive economic growth and create much-needed employment at a far higher rat

src_text: UMongameli ubugcizelelile ubumqoka nokubaluleka kweNhlosombono yowezi-2030 yoHlelo Lukazwelonke Lokuthuthukiswa Kwezwe kanye noHlelo Lokwakhiwa Kabusha Nokuvuselelwa Komnotho ukuze kusheshiswe imizamo yokwenza ngcono izimo zabantu baseNingizimu Afrik
trg_text: The President underscored the centrality of Vision 2030 of the National Development Plan and the Economic Reconstruction and Recovery Plan to accelerate efforts to improve the conditions of South African

src_text: Ngaphezu kwesimo somnotho kanye nezinguquko eziphathelene nokwakheka komnotho, iKhabhinethi liphinde futhi laxoxisana ngokuthuthukiswa kwengqalasizinda, ukutholakala kwamandla kagesi anele ngaso sonke isikhathi, ukukhiqizwa nokulungiswa kwezimpahla nemikhiqizo ngaphakathi kuleli kanye nokusungulwa kwezimboni, izinguquko kwezomhlaba nezolimo kanye nokulethwa kwezinguquko emabhizinisini ombus
trg_text: In addition to the state of the economy and structural reforms, the Cabinet Lekgotla also discussed infrastructure development, energy security, localisation and industrialisation, land reforms and agriculture, and reform of state-owned enterprise

src_text: Imizamo yokunciphisa ukuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi nobubha ibandakanya inhlanganisela yamathuba omsebenzi athe xaxa emkhakheni ozimele, amathuba omsebenzi axhaswe ngezimali nguhulumeni kanye nokwandiswa kwezibonelelo zikahulumeni zokubhekelela abantu abangasebenz
trg_text: Efforts to reduce unemployment and poverty will include a blend of increased private sector employment, publicly funded employment and expanded social protection for unemployed peopl

src_text: Umhlangano uphinde futhi wabhunga nangezinselele kanye nenqubekela-phambili esiyenziwe empini yokulwisana nobugebengu nenkohlakalo, kanye nemizamo yokuthuthukisa nokuphucula ukuphepha nokuvikeleka komphakath Kuxoxiwe futhi nangokuthunyelwa kwezidingongqangi kubantu ngaphansi kohulumeni basekhaya
trg_text: The meeting also deliberated on challenges and progress in the fight against crime and corruption, and efforts to enhance public safety and securit It also

src_text: kubandakanya ukuhlinzekwa kukagesi, amanzi nokuthuthwa kwendle
trg_text: including the provision of electricity, water and sanitation

src_text: njengengxenye esemqoka yokwakha amandla okusebenza oMbus
trg_text: as an important part of building the capacity of the Stat

src_text: Izingxoxo ze-Lekgotla yeKhabhinethi zizoba yisisekelo nomhlahlandlela wezinto eziseqhulwini ezizokwenziwa nguhulumeni kulo nyaka esiwuphethe ezizokwethulwa ngokucacileyo nguMongameli u-Ramaphosa ngenkathi ethula iNkulumo Echaza Isimo Sezwe ngoLwesine mhla ziyi-10 kuNhlolanja 2022.
trg_text: The Cabinet Lekgotla deliberations are to inform government s priorities for the year ahead which President Ramaphosa will set out during the State of the Nation Address on Thursday, 10 February 2022.

src_text: IZINQUMO ZEKHABHINETHI1.
trg_text: CABINET DECISIONS1.

src_text: Uhlelo Lwesigaba Sesibili se-SA Connect
trg_text: SA Connect

src_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukuqaliswa kwesigaba sesibili somklamo i-SA Connec Lolu hlelo luqalisa ukusebenza kweNqubomgomo yaleli lizwe ye-Inthanethi Esheshayo eyamukelwa ngokusemthethweni yiKhabhinethi ngowezi-2013.
trg_text: Cabinet approved the roll-out of the second phase of the SA Connect projec The plan gives effect to the country s Broadband Policy which was adopted by Cabinet in 2013.

src_text: Isigaba Sokuqala kwabe kuyisigaba sokuhlola nokulinga ukuthi kungaba yimpumelelo yini ukuhlinzekwa kwezinsizakalo ze-inthanethi esheshayo engamaMegabhithi (ama-Mbps) ayi-10 ezikhungweni zikahulumeni ezingama-970 ezisemqok
trg_text: Phase 1 served as a pilot phase to provide 10 Megabits (Mbps) broadband services to about 970 critical government facilitie

src_text: Isigaba sesibili esigunyaziwe sizoqaliswa ngokusebenzisa izikhungo zombuso (i-State Information Technology Agency [i-SITA]); i-Broadband Infraco ne-Sentech) kanye nemboni ye-inthanethi esheshay Kulezi zinyanga ezingama-36 ezilandelayo, lo mklamo uzoxhumanisa nalezi ezinye izikhungo zikahulumeni, imiphakathi kanye namakhaya asilel
trg_text: The approved second phase will be rolled out using state-owned entities (State Information Technology Agency [SITA]); Broadband Infraco and Sentech) and the industr Over the next 36 months, the project will connect the remaining government facilities, communities and household

src_text: Umklamo uyingxenye yokuzibophezela kukahulumeni ekuvaleni igebe elikhona kwezokuxhumana ngobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje nokutholakala kwe-inthanethi kubantu bonke, ikakhulukazi emiphakathini esezindaweni zasemakhaya futhi kuzothuthukisa umnotho osekelwe kwezokuxhumana ngobuchwepheshe besimanjemanj Ukubamba iqhaza komkhakha ozimele kuzolekelela futhi nasekuletheni uguquko kulo mkhakha ngokuthi kubandakanywe bonke ababambiqhaza abafanelekile emkhakheni wezokuxhumana ngobuxhakaxhaka bobuchwepheshe besimanjemanj
trg_text: The project forms part of government s commitment to bridge the digital divide, especially in rural communities, and advance the digital econom The participation of the private sector will also address the transformation of the sector by involving all relevant role players in the electronic network secto

src_text: Umklamo i-SA Connect uhlose ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ingama-80% imiphakathi kanye nezikhungo zikahulumeni ezifinyelelayo ku-inthanethi esheshayo kule minyaka emithathu ezayo, okungenani ngesivinini se-inthanethi esiyi-10 Mbps ngomzuzwana kanye nesivinini esiyi-100 Mbps kulezo zikhungo eziyisebenzisa kakhulu i-inthaneth
trg_text: The SA Connect project targets to achieve 80% broadband access in communities and government facilities over the next three years with a minimum speed capacity of 10Mbps per second and 100 Mbps for the high-demand facilitie

src_text: ABAQASHIWEBonke abaqashiwe kumele kuqinisekiswe iziqu zabo futhi bahlolwe ngokufanele UNks Nomthandazo Lichie Moyo oqashwe njengePhini likaMqondisi-Jikelele (u-DDG): Wezokuthuthukiswa Kwezindawo Zasemakhaya eMnyangweni Wezolimo, Izinguquko Kwezomhlaba kanye Nokuthuthukiswa Kwezindawo Zasemakhaya (i-DALRRD).
trg_text: Ms Nomthandazo Lichie Moyo as Deputy Director-General (DDG): Rural Development at the Department of Agriculture, Land Reform and Rural Development (DALRRD).
